availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, merchant. England native. Married to Catherine Ann Haldeman Escott in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on October 28, 1844. Father to Henry Vowles Escott, Wilson Haldeman Escott, Walter Newman Escott, Ellen Escott, Emily Escott, John Escott. Merchant in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1850. Merchant in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville/Ward 7, p. 484.

Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Jefferson County Marriages, Film #000482707, p. 184.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville/District 2, p. 173A.
